etymology.description: Depicts a ladle or spoon with a long handle.
etymology.interpretation: The character 勺(勺) (sháo, "spoon") visually resembles a spoon or ladle, representing its shape with a curved section for scooping and a handle.

examples.chinese: 勺是一种常见的餐具(勺是一種常見的餐具)。
examples.pinyin: Sháo shì yī zhǒng chángjiàn de cānjù.
examples.english: A spoon is a common piece of tableware.

examples.chinese: 妈妈用勺(媽媽用勺)，给宝宝喂饭(給寶寶喂飯)。
examples.pinyin: Māmā yòng sháo, gěi bǎobǎo wèi fàn.
examples.english: Mom uses a spoon to feed the baby.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢这把有花纹的勺(我喜歡這把有花紋的勺)，它很特别(它很特別)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan zhè bǎ yǒu huāwén de sháo, tā hěn tèbié.
examples.english: I like this patterned spoon; it is very special.
